Definition at line 54 of file Op_Conv_Muscl_old_VEF_Face.cpp.

References dabs(), dmin(), and sgn.

{
  int s1=sgn(grad1);
  int s2=sgn(grad2);
  int sc=sgn(gradc);
  double gradlim;
  if ((s1==s2) && (s2==sc))
    {
      gradlim=dmin(dabs(grad1), dabs(grad2));
      gradlim=dmin(dabs(gradlim), dabs(gradc));
      return sc*gradlim;
    }
  else
    return 0;
}
